description: The proposals would have given Ballakermeen High School pupils "a false sense of safety", planners say.
title: Ballakermeen High School one-way system plan rejected
title_page: Ballakermeen High School one-way system plan rejected - BBC News
maintext: The Department of Infrastructure (DOI) had applied to restrict vehicles to a single lane on the grounds of Ballakermeen High School and create a new exit on to Westbourne Drive in Douglas.
